message.body: Hey have you gotten grades back from es? Idk where to look
Yeah go to bearfacts, then click on students, then current term grades. There should be a drop list on the upper right of the page, and you have to switc
h midterm grades to final grades. That's what worked for me. They make it so confusing though!
Yeah I just figured it out and felt like an idiot haha. You happy with your grades?
Yup, 4.0! And I passed env sci, it's a good thing I took it pass/no pass. Are you happy with yours? I have wine and champagne to bring back to Berkeley f
rom France btw! See you in a few wks :)
That's awesome! Congrats! And I got all bs which I was expecting, so I'm not bummed or anything. But that's tight! (: see you soon!
Oh nice that's good! And I wanna see your new tat. Are you happy with how it turned out?
Yeah, im super stoked, did I sen you a photo?
I don't think you did yet. Send one if you have a minute!!
Omg I love it!! Seriously, it looks so amazing, I'm in shock. This was connor's guy, right? It's so well done!
Haha thanks, I really like it, can't wait for it to heal tho, itches like a bitch right now. And yeah it's him, I'm so happy with it
